missionstate.description: Gather the material Tereban listed. Talk to him about your mission when you have given him everything he was looking for.
You brought all the required materials to Tereban and guaranteed his sons a great birthday party.
Find the wyvern Heoni in the Edron mountains and take his sinew to Tereban.
You delivered Heoni's sinew to Tereban.
Find the special wood in the barbarian camps of Hrodmir and bring it to Tereban. It might be a good idea to start looking in the northernmost camp.
You delivered the Wood to Tereban.
Find the spectral cloth hidden deep in the crypts of the isle of the kings and bring it to Tereban. You might have to look for a secret entrance.
You delivered the spectral cloth to Tereban.
Find exquisite silk in the spider caves of southern Zao and deliver it to Tereban.
You brought Tereban the required silk.
Find a magic crystal in the tomb buried under the sand east of Ankrahmun and bring it to Tereban.
Tereban received the magic crystal he was looking for.
Find the mystic root under the city of Banuta and bring it to Tereban.
The magic root was delievered to Tereban.
Find some old iron in the mines of Kazordoon for Tereban. Don't get lost - start searching close to the city.
Tereban got the old iron he required.
Find the dragon Glitterscale in the caves north of Thais and take its scale to Tereban.
You handed the looted scale to Tereban.

mission.name: Daily Minor: Crystal Keeper
mission.description: Use the repair crystal to repair five damaged blue crystal in the crystal caves. Damaged crystals will not glow. |STATE| / 5

mission.name: Daily Minor: Raiders of the lost Spark
mission.description: Kill crystal crushers and use discharger item on the corpse to collect their charges. Gather 7 charges and report back. |STATE| / 7

mission.name: Daily Minor Plus: Exterminators
mission.description: Kill 10 of the wigglers for the gnomes. Then report back to the gnomes. |STATE| / 10

mission.name: Daily Minor Plus: Mushroom Digger
mission.description: Find a truffle sniffing pig and lure it around. Occasionally it will unearth some truffles. Use the baby pig on the truffles to feed it 3 times. Then report back to the gnomes. |STATE| / 3

missionstate.description: You have to enter the crystal caves and find a crystal that is fitting the crystal you got from the gnomes. Use the crystal on one of the bigger red crystal in the caves to bond them.
You have finished this quest for now.

mission.name: Daily Major: The Tinker's Bell
mission.description: Use the harmonic bell on the mad golems in the golem workshop so that they will automatically be teleported to the gnomish workshops. Then report back to the gnomes. |STATE| / 4

missionstate.description: Talk to Sven about mead and give him a honeycomb. For each honeycomb you will be allowed 20 sips.
Now drink from the bucket until you drink 10 sips in a row without passing out
You have completed this Test! Talk to Sven about the mead.

Sven gave you a Mead Horn. Fill it with mead from the bucket behind Sven (brown contents) and then proceed to the sleeping bear. The bear is inside a small ice cave in the north. Use the full mead horn on the bear so it becomes unconscious, then use the bear to hug it.
You hugging the bear! Go tell Sven that you hugged the bear!
You have completed this Test!
Go to the north-west of Svargrond and find the Mammoth. Drink your three mugs of mead, stand in front of the Mammoth and push it. Just use it...
You pushed the Mammoth! Go tell Sven that you pushed the Mammoth!
You have completed this Test! You can now be a citizen of Svargrond!
Your Mission is to go to a little camp of lizards at north-east of the Dragonblaze Peaks. You have to find and deliver the Tactical map complete the mission.
You delivered the Tactical map to Zalamon.
Go to the Temple of Equilibrium (it's marked on your map) and find out what happened there.
The temple has been corrupted and is lost. Zalamon should be informed about this as soon as possible.
You already reported Zalamon about the Temple! Ask him for new mission!
Go into the small camp Chaochai to the north of the Dragonblaze Peaks (Zalamon marks the entrance on your map). There are 3 buildings which you have to spy
You spied 1 of 3 buildings of the camp.
You spied 2 of 3 buildings of the camp.
You spied 3 of 3 buildings of the camp. Zalamon should be informed about this as soon as possible.
You already reported Zalamon about the camp! Ask him for new mission!

Get the poison from Zalamon's storage room. Then go to the teleporter to the Muggy Plains and head east from there to the rice fields. Go to the very top rice field and use the poison anywhere on the water.
The rice has been poisoned. This will weaken the Emperor's army significantly. Return and tell Zalamon about your success.
You already reported Zalamon about your success! Ask him for new mission!
Your mission is to find a way to enter the north of the valley and find a passage to the great gate itself. Search any temples or settlements you come across for hidden passages.
Report Zalamon about the strange symbols that you found.
Get the greasy oil from Zalamon's storage room and put them on the levers that you found.
Due to being extra greasy, the leavers can now be moved.
You found the right combination for the puzzle in the mountains and triggered some kind of mechanism. You should head back to Zalamon to report your success.
You already reported Zalamon about your success! You got a Tome of Knowledge as reward! Ask him for new mission!
Your mission is to use the portal in the chamber beyond the mechanism. It will lead you to the great gate.
Eternal guardians and lizard chosen has been awaken. Survive them and report it to Zalamon!
You Survived the Waves and reported Zalamon about your success! You got a Serpent Crest as reward!

mission.name: The Marid and the Efreet - Djinn Greeting

missionstate.description: Melchior told you the word "Djanni'hah" which can be used to talk to Djinns. Be aware that once you become an ally of one Djinn race, you cannot switch sides anymore.

mission.name: The Marid and the Efreet - Marid Faction

missionstate.description: You have joined the Marid. These friendly, blue Djinns are honest and fair allies. You have pledged eternal loyalty to King Gabel and may enter Asha'daramai freely. Djanni'hah!

mission.name: The Efreet and the Efreet - Efreet Faction

missionstate.description: You have joined the Efreet. These evil, green Djinns are always up to mischievous pranks. You have pledged eternal loyalty to King Malor and may enter Mal'ouquah freely. Djanni'hah!
Big Ben, the cyclops in Ab'Dendriel sends you to bring him 3 bast skirts for his woman. After this he will help you to forge different steel.
Big Ben, the cyclops in Ab'Dendriel will help you to forge different steel now. Just ask him if you need something.
Marina, the mermaid north of Sabrehaven sends you to bring her 50 honeycombs. After this she will help you create spool of yarn.
Marina, the mermaid north of Sabrehaven will help you to create a spool of yarn from 10 pieces of spider silk. Just ask her if you need something.
Quentin told you about an old prayer which can bind holy energy to an object. Each of its ten lines has to be recited by a different priest though. Bring Quentin a wooden stake from Gamon to start.
You received Quentin's prayer: "Light shall be near - and darkness afar". Now, bring your stake to Tibra in the Carlin church for the next line of the prayer.
You received Tibra's prayer: "Hope may fill your heart - doubt shall be banned". Now, bring your stake to Maealil in the Elven settlement for the next line of the prayer.
You received Maealil's prayer: "Peace may fill your soul - evil shall be cleansed". Now, bring your stake to Yberius in the Venore temple for the next line of the prayer.
You received Yberius' prayer: "Protection will be granted - from dangers at hand". Now, bring your stake to Isimov in the dwarven settlement for the next line of the prayer.
You received Isimov's prayer: "Unclean spirits shall be repelled". Now, bring your stake to Amanda in Edron for the next line of the prayer.
You received Amanda's prayer: "Wicked curses shall be broken". Now, bring your stake to Kasmir in Darashia for the next line of the prayer.
You received Kasmir's prayer: "Let there be honour and humility". Now, bring your stake to Rahkem in Ankrahmun for the next line of the prayer.
You received Rahkem's prayer: "Let there be power and compassion". Now, bring your stake to Brewster in Port Hope for the next line of the prayer.
You received Brewster's prayer: "Your hand shall be guided - your feet shall walk in harmony". Now, bring your stake to Tyrias in Liberty Bay for the next line of the prayer.
You received Tyrias' prayer: "Your mind shall be a vessel for joy, light and wisdom". He wasn't exactly happy though and said that if you need some mumbo jumbo again, you should rather go to Chondur.
Chondur was surprised to hear that you had to travel through all of Tibia to have your wooden stake blessed. He offered you help with the blessing if you should need one again in the future.
You've become the apprentice of Maltre Jean Pierre. The first dish he will teach you to prepare is Rotworm Stew. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the first dish, the second dish he will teach you to prepare is Hydra Tongue Salad. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the second dish, the third dish he will teach you to prepare is Roasted Dragon Wings. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the third dish, the fourth dish he will teach you to prepare is Tropical Fried Terrorbird. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the fourth dish, the fifth dish he will teach you to prepare is Banana Chocolate Shake. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the fifth dish, the sixth dish he will teach you to prepare is Veggie Casserole. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the sixth dish, the seventh dish he will teach you to prepare is Filled Jalapeno Peppers. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the seventh dish, the eight dish he will teach you to prepare is Blessed Steak. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the eight dish, the ninth dish he will teach you to prepare is Northern Fishburger. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the ninth dish, the tenth dish he will teach you to prepare is Carrot Cake. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the tenth dish. You are now able to obtain the cookbook from Jean Pierre's room upstairs.
The eleventh dish he will teach you to prepare is Coconut Shrimp Bake. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the eleventh dish, the twelfth dish he will teach you to prepare is Blackjack. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the twelfth dish, the thirteenth dish he will teach you to prepare is Demonic Candy Balls. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the thirteenth dish, the fourteenth dish he will teach you to prepare is Sweet Mangonaise Elixir. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed all the dishes. You are now able to make all the dishes in any order you want.
Palimuth asked you to help with some sewer malfunctions. You will need a Crowbar, there are 4 places where you need to go marked with an X on your map.
You cleaned 1 pipe of 4 from the garbage.
You cleaned 2 pipes of 4 from the garbage.
You cleaned 3 pipes of 4 from the garbage.
You cleaned 4 pipes of 4 from the garbage. Go back to Palimuth and report your mission
You cleaned all pipes from the garbage! Go back to Palimuth and ask for mission.
You have to find all 7 guards and give a report to them.
You reported to 1 of 7 guards
You reported to 2 of 7 guards
You reported to 3 of 7 guards
You reported to 4 of 7 guards
You reported to 5 of 7 guards
You reported to 6 of 7 guards
You reported to 7 of 7 guards! Go back to Palimuth and ask for mission.
Get the notes in Palimuths room and read them. Talk to Palimuth again when you've read the notes.
Talk to Azerus the Yalahari in the city centre to get your next mission.
Get the notes behind the Yalahari and read them. Talk to Azerus again and ask him for mission when you've read the notes.
Ask Palimuth for mission.
First you will need to kill the three plague bearers and then get The Alchemists' Formulas. When this have been done head back to either Palimuth (good side) or Yalahari (Azerus) (bad side).
Ask Azerus the Yalahari for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for mission.

For this mission you are asked to go to the Trade Quarter and negotiate or threaten Mr. West. Once again you will gain access to the mechanism although if you choose to help Palimuth you should go through the sewers.
You decided to help Palimuth, report him your mission.
You decided to help Azerus, report him your mission.
Get back to Azerus and report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for mission.
On this mission you are asked to find a druid by the name of Tamerin, on the Arena Quarter. You now have permission to use the gates mechanism.
The first is to bring Tamerin a flask of Animal Cure, you can buy this from Siflind on Nibelor (northeast of Svargrond).
now you have to kill Morik the Gladiator and bring his helmet to Tamerin as proof.

Report back to Tamerin as he will listen to your request and you can now make your choice: Cattle for Palimuth (good side), Warbeasts for Yalahari (Azerus) (bad side). Then report the one you decided your mission.
You decided to help Palimuth, report him your mission.
You decided to help Azerus, report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for mission.

Yalahari (Azerus) orders you to travel to the Cemetery Quarter and find the Strange Carving. He gives you a Ghost Charm and tells you to charge it with the tormented souls of the ghosts there to be used as an energy source. Palimuth wants the Charged Ghost Charm in order to free those souls. You can new use the Cemetery Quarter mechanism now. Go to the big building in the Cemetery Quarter and use the Ghost Charm on the Strange Carving at the back of the room.
Good side: Go to Palimuth, ask him about your mission, and hand in the charm. Bad side: Ask about your mission to Yalahari (Azerus) and give it back.
Get back to Azerus and report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for mission.

Bad side: Yalahari (Azerus) will send you for a new mission to go to the Sunken Quarter and kill the Quara Leaders, Inky, Splasher and Sharptooth. Good side: Rather than fighting any Quara leaders Palimuth will instead send you to find the cause for the Quaras aggressive behavior. Find Maritima and talk to her about the Quara and she will explain what their problem is.
Get back to Palimuth and report him your mission.
You killed the Quarabosses. Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for mission.

Bad side: For this mission the Yalahari requests you go to the Factory Quarter and find a pattern crystal, which will be used to supply weapons to help take control of the city. Good side: Palimuth will send you there to use the crystal to supply food for the city.
Get back to Azerus and report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.

You now need to decide between supporting Palimuth or the Yalahari's goal. To choose Palimuth's good side go to him, and simply ask him for a mission mission. Likewise, to join the Yalahari (Azerus) (bad side) go to him and say the same.
you already decided!
Palimuth told you that a circle of Yalahari is planning some kind of ritual. They plan to create a portal for some powerful demons and to unleash them in the city to 'purge' it once and for all.
The entrance to their inner sanctum has been opened for you. Be prepared for a HARD battle! Better gather some friends to assist you.
Report back to whichever principal you have chosen to help and you will receive Yalaharian Outfits.
You got the access to the reward room. Choose carefully which reward you pick as you can only take one item.
You have completed the Quest!

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Member
mission.description: You are member of the Paw and Fur hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Paw & Fur points.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Ranger
mission.description: You are Ranger of the Paw and Fur hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Paw & Fur points.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Big Game Hunter
mission.description: You are Big Game Hunter in the Paw and Fur hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Paw & Fur points.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Trophy Hunter
mission.description: You are Trophy Hunter in the Paw and Fur hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Paw & Fur points. Ask Grizzly Adams for 'special task' he might have something for you.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Elite Hunter
mission.description: You have obtained the highest possible rank in the Paw and Fur hunting elite, you are Elite Hunter. You currently have |STATE| Paw & Fur points. Ask Grizzly Adams for 'special task' he might have something for you.

missionstate.description: Grizzly Adams told you that there is Tiquandas Revenge hiding somewhere in the jungle of Port Hope. Go find its hideout and kill it.
You have slained the Tiquandas Revenge.
Grizzly Adams wanted you to go look for Demodras' hideout. He also mentioned that it might be somewhere under the Plains of Havoc.
You have slained the Demodras.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: The Snapper
mission.description: Grizzly told you about the Snapper, a crocodile that already killed many citizens of Port Hope. Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Hide
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Deathbine
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: The Bloodtusk
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Shardhead
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Esmerelda
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Fleshcrawler
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Ribstride
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Bloodweb
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Thul
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: The Old Widow
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Hemming
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Tormentor
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Flameborn
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Fazzrah
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Tromphonyte
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Sulphur Scuttler
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: The Many
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: The Noxious Spawn
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Gorgo
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Stonecracker
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Leviathan
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Kerberos
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Ethershreck
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Paiz the Pauperizer
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Bretzecutioner
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Zanakeph
mission.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

mission.name: Edron City - Elite Hunting: Trolls
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/100 trolls.

mission.name: Edron City - Elite Hunting: Goblins
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/150 goblins.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Trolls
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/100 trolls.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Globins
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/150 globins.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Crocodiles
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 crocodiles.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Badgers
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 badgers.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Tarantulas
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 tarantulas.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Carniphilas
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/150 carniphilas.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Stone Golems
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/200 stone golems.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Mammoths
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 mammoths.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Gnarlhounds

mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 terramites.

mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 thornback tortoises.

mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 gargoyles.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Ice Golems

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Quara Scouts
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/400 quara scouts.

mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/400 mutated rats.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Ancient Scarabs
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/250 ancient scarabs.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Wyverns

mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 lancer beetles.

mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 wailing widows.

mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 crystal spiders.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Mutated Tigers
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 mutated tigers.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Underwater Quara
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/600 underwater quara.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Giant Spiders
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/500 giant spiders.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Werewolves
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/300 werewolves.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Nightmares
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/400 nightmares.

mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/600 hellspawns.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: High Class Lizards
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/800 high class lizards.

mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/500 brimstone bugs.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Mutated Bats
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/400 mutated bats.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Hydras
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/650 hydras.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Serpent Spawns
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/800 serpent spawns.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Medusas
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/500 medusas.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Behemoths
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/700 behemoths.

mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/900 sea serpents and young sea serpents.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Hellhounds
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/250 hellhounds.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Ghastly Dragons
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/500 ghastly dragons.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Drakens
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/900 drakens.

mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/650 destroyers.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Demons
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/6666 demons.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Green Djinns or Efreets
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/500 green djinns or efreets.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Blue Djinns or Marids
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/500 blue djinns or marids.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Pirates
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/3000 pirates.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Pirates Second
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/3000 pirates.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Minotaurs
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/5000 minotaurs.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Necromancers and Priestess
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/4000 necromancers and priestess.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Necromancers and Priestess Second
mission.description: You already hunted |STATE|/1000 necromancers and priestess.

missionstate.description: Atrad wants only two items from you for his old katana: a behemoth claw and a nose ring, both at the same time. He also told you about a "horned fox" who wears such as nose ring
You have received the second assassin addon.
Collect 100 pieces of minotaur leather and bring it to either Amber or Lubo to have them make a backpack addon for you.
You delivered 100 pieces of minotaur leather. Some time is needed to make the backpack for you though. You should check back later and ask either Amber or Lubo for your backpack.
Collect a legion helmet, 100 chicken feathers and 50 honeycombs and bring them to either Hanna or Norma to have them make a feather hat addon for you.

Bron told you that his brother Ajax in Northport needs to learn that violence is not always the answer. He told you to make his brother angry, then show him that all he needed to do was say 'please' to fix the situation.
You will need to leave Ajax alone for an hour, then return to him.
Ajax told you that he has thought about it, and that violence is not always good. Return to Bron now, and tell him that Ajax said fist not always good
Bron mentioned that he has someone in his house that he doesn't like, and he wants you to get advice from Ajax about how to handle the situation. Go back to Ajax and ask him about Gelagos
Ajax told you his brother needs Fighting Spirit, and that you should get some from a Djinn and give it to him.
You brought Bron the Fighting Spirit. He acted a little strange.
In order to make a shirt as a present for Ajax, Bron wants you to bring him 50 Pieces of Red Cloth and 50 Pieces of Green Cloth.
Bron wants you to bring him 10 Spider Silk Yarn.
Bron wants you to bring him the Warrior's Sweat.
You brought him all required items! accept it!
You got the Barbarian Wig Addon! Bring now the present from Bron to Ajax!
Bring Ajax in Northport 100 Iron Ore.
Bring Ajax 1 Huge Chunk of Crude Iron.
Bring Ajax 50 Perfect Behemoth Fang
Bring Ajax 50 Lizard Leather
Come later in 2 hours and ask Ajax for the axe.
You got the Axe Addon!
Your current task is to bring Hugo 20 pieces of brown cloth, like the worn and ragged ghoul clothing.
Your current task is to bring 50 pieces of minotaur leather to Hugo. If you don't know how to get leather, you should ask Kalvin.
Your current task is to bring 10 bat wings to Hugo.
Your current task is to bring 30 heaven blossoms to Hugo. Elves are said to cultivate these flowers.
You brought all items required for the "poor man's look" to Hugo. He told you to come back to him after a whole day has passed, then the outfit should be finished.
You got the outfit!
Ceiron sends you to collect a sample of the blooming Griffinclaw.
Ask Ceiron for task.

take Ceirons waterskin and try to fill it with water from this special trickle. In the mountains between Ankrahmun and Tiquanda are two hydra lairs. It is important that you take the water directly from the trickle, not from the pond
Ask Ceiron for task.
Bring Ceiron 100 ounces of demon dust.
Ask Ceiron for task.
The last mission is to find and retrieve Ceiron's Wolf Tooth Chain lost inside the Orc Fortress.
Ask Ceiron for Faolan.
Head over to Cormaya, find A Majestic Warwolf's Cave and ask her about an addon.
You got the Outfit!
Elane sends you to Liberty Bay to bring her the Crossbow from the Cult.
Bring Elane 100 pieces of lizard leather and 100 pieces of red dragon leather.
Bring Elane 5 enchanted chicken wings.
Bring Elane one piece of royal steel, draconian steel and hell steel each.
You got the Outfit!
Your current task is to bring 100 perfect behemoth fangs to Gregor in Thais.
Your current task is to retrieve the helmet of Ramsay the Reckless from Banuta. These pesky apes steal everything they can get their dirty hands on.
Your current task is to obtain a flask of warrior's sweat, which can be magicially extracted from headgear worn by a true warrior, but only in small amounts. Djinns are said to be good at this.
Your current task is to bring royal steel to Gregor in Thais. Royal steel can only be refined by very skilled smiths.
You have delivered all items required for the helmet addon. Go talk to Sam and tell him Gregor sent you. He will be glad to refine your helmet.
Sam is currently creating the helmet for you. Be patient and don't forget to check on it later!
You found Angelina in a Prison. She told you a secret: Lynda in Thais can create a blessed wand. Greet her from Angelina, maybe she will aid you.
Lynda send you to bring her a sample of all five wands and five rods (Snakebite, Moonlight, Necrotic, Terra, Hailstorm, Vortex, Dragonbreath, Decay, Cosmic Energy and Inferno)
Bring Lynda 10 ounces of magic sulphur
Bring Lynda the Necromancer's soul stone
Bring Lynda 20 ankhs now to complete the ritual.
You got the Outfit!
Now you can get a lottery ticket at Sandra for 100 empty vials.
You got the Outfit! Now you can get for a lottery prize 50000 gold!

mission.name: Female Mage and Male Summoner Addon: Headgear

missionstate.description: Your current task is to bring 70 bat wings to Myra in Port Hope.
Your current task is to bring 20 pieces of red cloth to Myra in Port Hope. These are said to make an excellent material for a cape.
Your current task is to bring 40 pieces of ape fur to Myra in Port Hope.
Your current task is to bring 35 holy orchids to Myra in Port Hope. Elves are said to cultivate these.
Your current task is to bring 10 spools of spider silk yarn to Myra in Port Hope. Only very large spiders produce silk which is strong enough to be yarned by mermaids.
Your current task is to bring 60 lizard scales to Myra in Port Hope. Lizard scales are great for all sort of magical potions.
Your current task is to bring 40 red dragon scales to Myra in Port Hope.
Your current task is to bring 15 ounces of magic sulphur to Myra in Port Hope. Djinns are said to be good at extracting magic sulphur.
Your current task is to bring 30 ounces of vampire dusts to Myra in Port Hope. You might need to ask a priest for a special blessed stake to turn vampires into dust.
You finally collected all of the items which Myra asked for. Go talk to Zoltan in Edron and tell him that Myra nominated you for an award.
Bring Hjaern 5 frostheart shards to get the first Addon. Ask him for shard!
Bring Hjaern 10 frostheart shards to get the second Addon. Ask him for shard!
You got the Outfit Addons! You can trade the rest shards to Hjaern for 2000 gold each!
Your current task is to bring 100 hardened bones to Trisha in Carlin. They can sometimes be extracted from creatures that consist only of - you guessed it, bones. You need an obsidian knife though.
Your current task is to bring 100 turtle shells to Trisha in Carlin. Turtles can be found on some idyllic islands which have recently been discovered.
Your current task is to show that you have fighting spirit. Maybe someone grants you a wish...?
Your current task is to obtain a dragon claw. You cannot get this special claw from any common dragons in Tibia. It requires a special one, a lord among the lords.
You have delivered all items requried for the shoulder spike addon. Go talk to Cornelia and tell her Trisha sent you. She will be glad to create the should spikes.
Cornelia is currently creating the should spikes for you. Be patient and don't forget to check on it later!
You have obtained the shoulder spike addon.
Bring Lugri the Medusa shield!
Bring Lugri the Dragon Scale Mail!
Bring Lugri the Crown Legs!
Bring Lugri the Ring of the Sky!
You got the first Outfit Addon!
Bring The Queen Of The Banshees 50 Holy Orchids and she will reward you with the second addon.
You got the second Outfit Addon!
Bring Duncan 100 Eye Patches from pirates!
Bring Duncan 100 peg legs from pirates!
Bring Duncan 100 pirate hooks from pirates!
Go to Morgan and tell him this codeword: 'firebird' to get the outfit addon!
You got the Outfit Addon!
Your current task is to find a mermaid's comb. If you have ever encountered a mermaid, you should ask her. Bring the comb to Habdel if you are male or to Ishina if you are female.
You have received the first oriental addon.
Your current task is to bring 100 pieces of ape fur to Razan if you are male, or to Miraia if you are female.
Your current task is to bring 100 fish fins to Razan if you are male, or to Miraia if you are female.
Your current task is to bring 2 enchanted chicken wings to Razan if you are male, or to Miraia if you are female.
Your current task is to bring 100 pieces of blue cloth to Razan if you are male, or to Miraia if you are female.
You have received the second oriental addon.
Try to find a monster which sometimes lurks in the Tiquandian jungle as the revenge of the jungle against mankind. Bring the rare root it carries to Chondur as well as 5 voodoo dolls.
You have received the first shaman addon.
Your current task is to collect 5 tribal masks from the dworcs and 5 banana staves from the apes. Bring them to Chondur to earn your shamanic mask.
You have received the second shaman addon.
Sam sends you to see Kroox in Kazordoon to get a special dwarven armor. Just tell him, his old buddy Sam is sending you.
You have the permission to retrive a dwarven armor from the mines. The problem is, some giant spiders made the tunnels where the storage is their new home.

mission.name: Dwarven Armor Quest
mission.description: You have completed Dwarven Armor Quest!

mission.name: Omruc's Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Omruc and received a helmet adornment

mission.name: Thalas' Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Thalas and received a Gem Holder

mission.name: Diphtrah's Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Dipthrah and received a Damaged Helmet

mission.name: Mahrdis' Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Mahrdis and received a Helmet Ornament

mission.name: Vashresamun's Treasure
mission.description: You solved the musical riddles of Vashresamun's Tomb and received a left horn.

mission.name: Morguthis' Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Morguthis and received a Right Horn

mission.name: Rahemos' Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Rahemos and received a Helmet Piece

missionstate.description: Find whisper moss in the dworc settlement south of Port Hope and bring it back to Hairycles.
You have completed the first mission. Hairycles was happy about the whisper moss you gave to him. He might have another mission for you.
Hairycles asked you to bring him cough syrup from a human settlement. A healer might know more about this medicine.
You have completed the second mission. Hairycles was happy about the cough syrup you gave to him. He might have another mission for you.
Hairycles asked you to bring him a magical scroll from the lizard settlement Chor.
You have completed the third mission. Hairycles appreciated that you brought the scroll to him and will try to read it. Maybe he has another mission for you later.
Since Hairycles was not able to read the scroll you brought him, he asked you dig for a tomb in the desert to the east. Proceed in this tomb until you find an obelisk between red stones and read it.
You have completed the fourth mission. Hairycles read your mind and can now translate the lizard scroll. He might have another mission for you.
Hairycles wants to create a life charm for the ape people. He needs a hydra egg since it has strong regenerating powers.
You have completed the fifth mission. Hairycles attempts to create a might charm for the protection of the ape people. He might have another mission for you later.
Hairycles need a witches' cap mushroom which is supposed to be hidden in a dungeon deep under Fibula.
You have completed the sixth mission. You brought the witches' cap mushroom back to Hairycles. He might have another mission for you.
Hairycles is worried about an ape cult which drinks some strange fluid that the lizards left behind. Go to the old lizard temple under Banuta and destroy three of the casks there with a crowbar.
You have completed the seventh mission. You found the old lizard ruins under Banuta and destroyed three of the casks with snake blood. Hairycles might have another mission for you.
The apes now need a symbol of their faith. Speak with the blind prophet in a cave to the northeast and go to the Forbidden Land. Find a hair of the giant, holy ape Bong and bring it back.
You completed the eighth mission. Hairycles gladly accepted the hair of the ape god which you brought him. He told you to have one final mission for you.
Go into the deepest catacombs under Banuta and destroy the monument of the snake god with the hammer that Hairycles gave to you.
You successfully destroyed the monument of the snake god. As reward, you can buy sacred statues from Hairycles. If you haven't done so yet, you should also ask him for a shaman outfit.
Travel to Thais and keep your eyes open for something that might give you a clue on the supply thief.
You have found the potential supply thief - Partos in Thais seemed very suspicious. Baa'leal might be interested in this matter.
You have reported the case to Baa'leal. He seemed very satisfied and told you that Alesar might have another mission for you.

mission.name: Efreet Mission 2: The Tear of Daraman

missionstate.description: Sneak into Ashta'daramai and steal a "Tear of Daraman". For more information about these gems visit the Efreet library.
You have successfully managed to steal a Tear of Daraman from Ashta'daramai. Bring it to Alesar.
You have delivered Daraman's Tear. Alesar seemed very satisfied and told you that Malor himself might have another mission for you.
Malor asked you to find Fa'hradin's sleeping lamp in the orc fortress at Ulderek's Rock. Then, sneak into Ashta'daramai and exchange Gabel's sleeping lamp with Fa'hradin's lamp.
You successfully exchanged the lamps. Malor will be happy to hear about this.
The Efreet are very satisfied with your help. King Malor allowed you to trade with Yaman and Alesar.
Bring a cookbook of the dwarven kitchen to Bo'ques.
You have delivered the cookbook. Bo'ques seemed very satisfied and told you that Fa'hradin might have another mission for you.
Fa'hradin asked you to sneak into the Efreet fortress Mal'ouqhah and find their undercover spy. The codeword is PIEDPIPER.
You have delivered the spyreport. Fa'hradin seemed impressed and told you that Gabel himself might have another mission for you.
You have promised Rata'Mari cheese. Once you deliver some to him, he will hand over his spyreport.
You got Rata'Mari's spyreport. He seems to be quite happy with the cheese you brought him.
Gabel asked you to find Fa'hradin's sleeping lamp in the orc fortress at Ulderek's Rock. Then, sneak into Mal'ouqhah and exchange Malor's sleeping lamp with Fa'hradin's lamp.
You successfully exchanged the lamps. Gabel will be happy to hear about this.
The Marid deeply appreciate your help. King Gabel allowed you to trade with Haroun and Nah'bob.
Kevin wants you to travel with Captain Bluebear to Carlin.
Kevin wants you to travel with Uzon in Femor Hills to Edron.
Kevin wants you to travel with Captain Seahorse to Venore.
Kevin wants you to travel with Brodrosch to Cormaya
You have checked the Postal Routes, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to fix one of their Mailboxes located on Folda with a crowbar.
You have fixed the mailbox, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to deliver a bill to the stage magician David Brassacres. He's hiding from his creditors somewhere in Venore.
You have found the David Brassacres, deliver him the bill!
You have delivered the bill to the stage magician David Brassacres, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
You have delivered 20 Bones to Kevin.
Kevin has asked you to retrieve the present behind the door on the lower right side of his room and deliver it to Dermot in Fibula.
You have delivered the present to Dermot, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin has asked you to travel to Venore and negotiate with Hugo for new uniforms.
Hugo said that his dog ate the last dress pattern they used and he has no clue where Kevin Postner got it from, go ask Kevin.
Kevin wants you to ask the great Technomancer Talphion in Kazordoon for the technical details.
Talphion will send a copy to Kevin, report back to Kevin.
Kevin wants you tk ask Queen Eloise of Carlin for the perfect colours.
Queen Eloise said she will send some color samples via mail to Kevin, report back to Kevin.
Kevin has asked you to go to Noodles and find out what he dislikes the most: mouldy cheese, a piece of fur or a banana skin.
You have found out what Noodles dislike! Report back to Kevin.
Kevin wants you to tell Hugo that they order those uniforms.
Hugo has agreed to make the uniforms, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to bring him the measurements of Ben, Lokur, Dove, Liane, Chrystal and Olrik.
You have received the measurements from 1 of 6 postofficers.
You have received the measurements from 2 of 6 postofficers.
You have received the measurements from 3 of 6 postofficers.
You have received the measurements from 4 of 6 postofficers.
You have received the measurements from 5 of 6 postofficers.
You have received all measurements, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to find the missing courier Waldo or at least his posthorn.
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to deliver som letters to Santa Claus on Vega.
You have delivered the letters to Santa Claus on Vega.
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to deliver a letter to Markwin, king of Mintwallin from his mother.
You have delivered the letter to Markwin.
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Assistant Postman
Grand Postman
Grand Postman for Special Operations
Arch Postman
You need to return to Marina and ask her for a date with Ocelus.
You need to return to Ocelus with the bad news.
Ocelus told you to get a poem for him, if you didn't buy one already, head to Ab'Dendriel and buy a Love Poem from Elvith.
You need to go recite the poem to Marina and impress her with the Djinn's romantic and poetic abilities.
After reciting the poem to Marina, she decided to date Ocelus and release Ray Striker from her spell.
You need to find the man-stealing mermaid and try to break her spell over poor Raymond, the mermaid Marina is near the northern coast of the island.
You discovered that she does in fact have a spell on him, and will not release him unless someone better comes along.
You are a true master in reciting love poems now. No mermaid will be able to resist if you ask for a date!

mission.name: Access to Goroma
mission.description: After helping Jack Fate to collect the 30 woodpieces, Jack Fate in Liberty Bay will bring you to Goroma.

mission.name: Access to Laguna Island
mission.description: After arranging a date for Marina and Ocelus, you are allowed to use Marina's sea turtles. They will bring you to the idyllic Laguna Islands.

mission.name: Access to Meriana
mission.description: After earning the trust of the governor's daughter Eleonore, Captain Waverider in Liberty Bay will bring you to Meriana if you tell him the secret codeword 'peg leg'.

missionstate.description: You have begun Chondur's ritual. Bring him a fresh dead chicken so that he can begin to create a counterspell which will allow you to pass the magical barrier on Goroma.
You have begun Chondur's ritual. Bring him a fresh dead rat so that he can continue creating a counterspell which will allow you to pass the magical barrier on Goroma.
You have begun Chondur's ritual. Bring him a fresh dead black sheep so that he can complete his counterspell which will allow you to pass the magical barrier on Goroma.
You may pass the energy barrier on Goroma. The counterspell Chondur created for you with his ritual will allow you to withstand the evil magic of the cultist.
You told Eleonore to run a small errand. Deliver the 200 gold pieces she gave to the herbalist Charlotta in the south-western part of Liberty Bay.
You delivered the gold to Charlotta. Return to Eleonore and tell her the secret password: peg leg
You promised to find Eleonore's lost ring. She told you that a parrot stole it from her dressing table and flew to the nearby mountains. You might need a rake to retrieve the ring.
You returned the ring to Eleonore.

mission.name: The Hidden Seal
mission.description: You broke the first seal.

mission.name: The Seal of Logic
mission.description: You broke the sixth seal.

mission.name: The Seal of True Path
mission.description: You broke the fifth seal.

mission.name: The Seal of Sacrifice
mission.description: You broke the fourth seal.

mission.name: The Seal of Demonrage
mission.description: You broke the third seal.

mission.name: The Plague Seal
mission.description: You broke the second seal.

mission.name: All Seals
mission.description: You broke all the seals.

mission.name: Access to the Isle of Kings

missionstate.description: You are a friend of Dalbrect. Since you returned his family brooch he will sail you to the Isle of Kings unless you do something stupid.
Investigate the catacombs. Abbot Costello should be interested in information about brother Fugio.
You returned Fugio's Diary. Costello was very thankful about your help and gave you a blessed ankh as reward.
